text: Mercer County is a county in the U.S. state of Pennsylvania. As of the 2020 census, the population was 110,652. Its county seat is Mercer, and Its largest city is Hermitage. == History == Mercer County was created in 1800 and later organized in 1803. == References == Category:1800s establishments in Pennsylvania Category:1803 establishments in the United States Category:Pennsylvania counties
title: Mercer County, Pennsylvania
